description.value: Measurement of the electrical activity generated by the heart.

purpose.value: To record the measurements of electrical activity generated by the heart over a short period of time and its associated clinical interpretation.

definition.value: Measurement of the electrical activity generated by the heart.

The craniocaudal tilt of the surface on which the person is lying during the ECG. Lying horizontally is considered the 0 degrees position.
